item.title: New Theme & Moved onto hugo blog from SNSs
item.description: This themes’s simplicity of beauty just haunting me so badly. Yes, This is my first blog. I’ve fallen love at the Eureka Themes.. Appreciate deeply on C. Wang who built this theme. Had other social platforms, but need to gather them all in one. Well, Yeah I’ve been using the Brunch(A Book-write-encouraging Platform). However, thought, it’d be better if funnel all traffics into a place where gathered all contents. Brunch Youtube OhMyNews Journalist Channel’s article Facebook Instagram Above all platforms are them which I used to write with.
